member.name: M:KLGates.Platform.Edw.GetEmployees(System.String)
member.summary: Get the employees identified by the list of identifiers
member.param: A comma and/or semi-colon separated list of AD usernames and/or EDW employee IDs

member.name: M:KLGates.Platform.EdwardRoleProvider.Initialize
member.summary: Initialize the comma or semicolon separated roles specified in the config file with the key Roles.

member.name: M:KLGates.Platform.EdwardRoleProvider.SetUser
member.summary: Sets the CurrentUser property using HttpContext.Current.User as the original principal. If HttpContext.Current.User is null then this method has no effect.

member.name: P:KLGates.Platform.EdwardRoleProvider.CurrentUser
member.summary: Gets or sets the current user as EDWPrincipal

member.name: P:KLGates.Platform.EdwClientIdentity.Employee
member.summary: Gets the Employee object associated with the OriginalPrincipal

member.name: P:KLGates.Platform.EdwClientIdentity.OriginalPrincipal
member.summary: Represents the original windows principal that was used to hydrate the current EDWPrincipal accessible through HttpContext.Current.User

member.name: P:KLGates.Platform.EdwClientPrincipal.Employee
member.summary: Gets the Security.Employee from EDW that represents the current user. If the current user's identity cannot be determined a new Security.Employee instance is returned with the FirstName set to "Unknown" and LastName set to "User". This is to prevent NullReferenceExceptions.
